catalog_script_client.name: Refresh Primary Site Info

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_36f1ac934714c610f4af2ad2e16d4395
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Network Service Request - Change Service">a78f64cb471b7d90f4af2ad2e16d439a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:019fe403475b7d90f4af2ad2e16d43bc</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Refresh Primary Site Info</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
	// alert('newValue = ' + newValue);

    var ga = new GlideAjax('x_g_sonc_ns_pro.cmdb_ci_site_ajax');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getSite');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_sys_id', newValue);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(getSite);

    function getSite(response) {
		
		// alert('response = ' + response);

		if (response.length > 0) {
			// BlankSiteInfo();  // doesn't actually work, leaving the site blank isn't picked up as a change to blank the displayed info
			var site = JSON.parse(response);
			g_form.setValue('site_name', site.name);
			g_form.setValue('location', site.location);
			g_form.setValue('dest_site_primary_poc', site.primary_poc);
			g_form.setValue('dest_site_alternate_poc', site.alternate_poc);
			g_form.setValue('dest_site', site.sys_id.toString());
			g_form.setValue('dest_location', site.location.toString());
			g_form.setValue('dest_county', site.county);
			g_form.setValue('dest_street', site.street);
			g_form.setValue('dest_city', site.city);
			g_form.setValue('dest_state', site.state);
			g_form.setValue('dest_zip', site.zip);
		}
		else {
			BlankSiteInfo();
		}
    }
}

function BlankSiteInfo() {
	g_form.setValue('site_name', '');
	g_form.setValue('location', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_site_primary_poc', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_site_alternate_poc', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_site', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_location', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_county', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_street', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_city', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_state', '');
	g_form.setValue('dest_zip', '');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wbbusby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-16 19:32:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>36f1ac934714c610f4af2ad2e16d4395</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh Primary Site Info</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NS Pro" source="x_g_sonc_ns_pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NS Pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_36f1ac934714c610f4af2ad2e16d4395</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wbbusby</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-21 22:57:17</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
